attributes.action: We ask the Government to consider the creation of a not-for-profit supermarket chain (Institution)
attributes.additional_details: An opportunity to take back control of public heath, help poorer families and benefit farmers. A self funding, Government led approach to reduce food waste, combat obesity, improve the prosperity of UK farms, reduce reliance on farming subsidies, reduce the financial pressure on families, reduce unemployment, increase competition among the big four and decrease competition with smaller businesses by not diversifying into other retail.
